name: s61_pavithra_capstone_handmadetreasures
description: The aim of this project is to build a website to sell handmade products online. Itâ€™s like a marketplace where people who make things by hand, like crafts, jewellery, pottery, painting, can show off and sell their creations. By creating a platform for handmade products, this website will provide a unique online destination for customers to discover and purchase one-of-a-kind, handcrafted items from talented artisans and crafters.
